## OWebRouter.start() method

Starts the router.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
start(firstRun?: boolean, target?: string, state?: ORouteStateObject): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  firstRun | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> first run flag |
|  target | string | <i>(Optional)</i> initial target, usualy the entry point |
|  state | [ORouteStateObject](./oweb.oroutestateobject.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> initial state |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
